title: documentation.next

labels.name: kind/epic
labels.description: Large issue with links to sub-issues

body:
Opened a few new issues:

- [X] https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/issues/28480: Update YAML generator (rule changes + warnings does not yet fail the build)
- [x] https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/issues/28481: Bring in vale linter
- [x] https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/issues/28483: Copy summaries from manual website guide docs into *.adoc files
- [x] https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/issues/28484: rsync / Jekyll: use generated indexes instead of manual guide files (needs 28483)
- [ ] Docs build improvements for quarkiverse docs that are included in website
- [ ] Generate metadata for included quarkiverse docs: 
  - amazon-dynamodb, amazon-iam, amazon-kms, amazon-s3, amazon-ses, amazon-sns, amazon-sqs, amazon-ssm
  - consul-config
  - jgit
  - logging-sentry
  - neo4j
  - reactive-messaging-http, reactive-messaging-websocket
  - security-jpa
  - tika
  - vault, vault-auth, vault-datasource, vault-transit
- [ ] Evaluate other quarkiverse repos that are not included (should they be? why aren't they?)
- [ ] Can we move redirects into *.adoc source metadata?
- [x] https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/issues/29103 - GH Action for Vale Linter on PRs with @michelle-purcell 


<!-- EPIC:DATA
     
-->
